alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:52PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Band of dissipating thunderstorms moving through the Rock Creek Fire area through 730 PM MDT... At 649 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of dissipating thunderstorms extending from 9 miles west of Spencer to 12 miles west of Dubois to 14 miles north of Monteview, moving east at 10 to 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 30 mph and brief light rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dubois, Spencer, and Small. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Fire crews working near the Rock Creek fire should prepare for gusty and erratic thunderstorm outflow winds through 730 PM MDT.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
